sentences: Stanley Hicks (1911â€“1989) was a nationally recognized American folk artist from Watauga County, North Carolina.
He is a recipient of a 1983 National Heritage Fellowship awarded by the National Endowment for the Arts, which is the United States government's highest honor in the folk and traditional arts.
In the early 1980s Hicks was filmed by UNC-TV for the "Music From The Hills" episode of the Folkways series.
